message: [AI Option 1] Rest is a luxury, but it can also be a trap for the unwary.
[AI Option 2] Fatigue is a thief that steals our clarity. Perhaps a moment of reflection will restore your vigor.
[AI Option 3] Ah, the weary traveler finds solace in the embrace of shadows. Yet remember, even in weariness, the night holds secrets that may yet awaken your spirit anew.
Request to respond to Player: "I'm getting tired now... "
